title: Manet and Modern Beauty
header_copy: The first Art Institute exhibition devoted exclusively to Édouard Manet in over 50 years focuses on the transformation of the artist’s style in his later years.
list_description: The first Art Institute exhibition devoted exclusively to Édouard Manet in over 50 years focuses on the artist's work in his later years—favorite actresses and models, illustrated letters, and elegant still lifes.
exhibition_message: This exhibition requires a $7 special exhibition ticket.
